name: Ancestral Awakening
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Search your deck for an ally with cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control. Put it into play with damage equal to its [HEALTH] -1.

name: Annihilate
rules: Destroy target exhausted ally or equipment.

name: Anti-Magic Shell
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Prevent the next non-melee damage that would be dealt to your hero this turn.

name: Astral Recall
rules: Remove this ability from the game. Put up to one target ability, up to one target ally, and up to one target equipment from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Bestial Rage
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1 for each Hunter and Warrior you control.

name: Blood Rune
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove an equipment in your graveyard from the game.;Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

name: Blustering Winds
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. They can't attack or protect this turn.

name: Curse of Doom
rules: Attach to target opposing ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy attached ally. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your deck, where X is the number of resources you control. Put a revealed Demon with cost X or less into play and shuffle the rest into your deck.

name: Dark Command
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has -3 ATK, must attack if able, and can attack only your hero if able.

name: Dementia
rules: Target player puts the top two cards of his deck into is graveyard. If they're both abilities, both allies, or both equipment, that player discards two cards.

name: Devastation
rules: Destruction Hero Required; As an additional cost to play, choose ability, ally, or equipment and destroy a card you control of that kind. Destroy all opposing cards of that kind.

name: Dire Bear Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Bear Form. (Has Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.) Your hero has +5 [Health] for each ally you control.

name: Drain Essence
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Expertise of Steel
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Dual Wield. Axes you control have +2 ATK. You pay 2 less to strike with Swords.

name: Explosive Flames
rules: Ongoing: If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn: 1, [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Explosive Shot
rules: Survival Hero Required;Destroy target opposing ally. If you do, your hero deals fire damage equal to that ally's cost to a second target hero or ally.

name: Eyes of the Beast
rules: Ongoing: 1, Exhaust your hero -> Ready target Pet you control.

name: Feast of Flame
rules: Attach to target hero or ally. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character for each Mage and Warlock you control.

name: Flash of Brilliance
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may destroy this ability. If you do, search your collection for an Ongoing [Mage] ability, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Flawless Defense
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector. Your hero has +1 ATK while defending.

name: Flesh Eating Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 5 nature damage to attached character.

name: Fright
rules: Target opponent puts an ally he controls into his owner's hand.

name: Frost Fever
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. Allies in attached hero's party lose and can't have Assault and Mend.

name: Frozen Solid
rules: The next time target opponent would draw a card this turn, you draw one instead.

name: Fusion Totem
rules: Ongoing: 1, Exhaust a totem you control -> ;Air: Exhaust target ally. ;Earth: Target ally has Assault 2 this turn. ;Fire: It deals 2 fire damage to target ally. ;Water: Target player draws a card.

name: Gift of the Earthmother
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +6/+6. When attached ally is destroyed, draw two cards.

name: Gift of the Pious
rules: Ongoing: Allies you control have +1 / +1 for each Druid and Paladin you control.

name: Gushing Totem
rules: Ongoing: When an opposing ability, ally or equipment enters play, you may draw a card.

name: Hail of Arrows
rules: Your hero deals ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies equal to the ATK of a Ranged weapon you control.

name: Hit and Run
rules: Exhaust up to X target opposing cards, where X is the number of Rogues and Shamans you control.

name: Holy Barrier
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target ally this turn, where X is the number of Paladins and Priests you control.

name: Holy Fury
rules: Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target ally. If that ally has fatal damage, destroy any number of abilities attached to a card you control.

name: Hysteria
rules: Blood Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust], Put 1 damage on a hero or ally you control -> It has Assault 4 this turn.

name: Ice Nova
rules: Play only on an opponent's turn. His abilities, allies, equipment and hero can't attack or exhaust this turn.

name: Impede
rules: Put a target [Shadow], [Holy] or [Nature] ally or weapon on top of its owner's deck.

name: Infusion of Earth
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon you control.;Ongoing: Attached card has Assault 3.

name: Kick Thinking
rules: Interrupt target ability with cost less than or equal to the number of Mages and Rogues you control.

name: Landro's Gift
rules: Search your deck for a Loot card, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck. Then, if an opponent controls more resources than you, draw a card.
flavour: Roll the dice and see if you get lucky! - Landro Longshot

name: Lesson of the Arcane
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Mage you control rather than pay this ability's cost. If a Mage you control is defending, remove it from combat and draw a card.

name: Lesson of the Beast
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Hunter you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Target Pet you control deals melee damage equal to its ATK to a second target ally.

name: Lesson of the Call
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Warrior you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Put target ally on top of it's owner's deck.

name: Lesson of the Divine
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Paladin you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during it's controller's next ready strop. Draw a card.

name: Lesson of the Elements
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Shaman you control rather than pay this ability's cost. You hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Lesson of the Grave
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Death Knight you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.

name: Lesson of the Light
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Priest you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Lesson of the Nether
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Warlock you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card. Remove that card from the game.

name: Lesson of the Shadow
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Rogue you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Target hero or ally has Assault 3 or Stealth this turn.

name: Lesson of the Wild
rules: You may exhaust a non-hero Druid you control rather than pay this ability's cost. Put target non-token ally into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust it.

name: Master Poisoner
rules: Assassination Hero Required; Ongoing: You pay 1 less to play poisons. At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero or ally for each Poison attached to it.

name: Master's Stable
rules: Ongoing: You can control an additional Pet. Pets you control have +1 / + 1 for each Hunter and Warlock you control.

name: Mongoose Bite
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target attacker, and that attacker has -2 ATK this turn.

name: Mortal Slash
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: Attached character can't be healed. At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to attached character.

name: Nature's Vengeance
rules: Destroy all resources you control. Put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play for each resource destroyed this way.

name: Netherwind Presence
rules: Arcane Hero Required;Draw seven cards.

name: Nurturing Spirit
rules: Attach to your hero.;Ongoing: Attached hero has Mend 1 for each Druid and Priest you control.

name: Pestilence
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to each exhausted opposing hero and ally.

name: Pick Lock
rules: Look at target player's hand and choose a location or quest. He discards that card.

name: Power Word: Faith
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Mend 3.;When attached ally heals damage, you may destroy target ability.

name: Presence of the Divine
rules: Ongoing: When an attacking ally deals damage to an ally you control, you may destroy that attacker.

name: Raze
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.) Destroy each opposing ally and equipment with cost X.

name: Requite
rules: Your hero deals 4 melee damage to target damaged hero or ally.

name: Sacred Circle
rules: Put target [Holy] ally from your graveyard into play if it costs less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Scald
rules: Attach to target equipment.;Ongoing: Attached equipment loses and can't have powers. At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached equipment's controller's hero.

name: Scent of Nature
rules: Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally, or 6 if you completed a quest this turn.

name: Seal of Sanctity
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage when a weapon, add a purity counter.;You hero has Mend 1 for each purity counter.

name: Shelter
rules: This turn, target non-hero card can't be destroyed, and if it's an ally, prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.

name: Stranglevine
rules: Attach to target opposing ability, ally, or equipment.;Ongoing: Attached card can't ready during it's controller's ready step. On your turn: 2 -> Attach this ability to target opposing ability, ally, or equipment.

name: Strength of Battle
rules: This turn, weapons you control have Assault 1 for each Shaman and Warrior you control.

name: Surge of Blood
rules: Your hero deal 2 melee damage to target hero or ally. Weapons you control have Assault 2 this turn.

name: Surge of Life
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from target ally. You may ready that ally.

name: Unyielding Faith
rules: Holy Hero Required; Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Void Pact
rules: You hero has Protector while you control no damaged allies.

name: Weakening Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: Attached character has -4 ATK.

name: Wrecking Crew
rules: Arms Hero Required; Interrupt target equipment. If you do, put three 0 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Warrior ally tokens into play with Assault 2.

name: Antyr
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target ability that's not attached to a friendly card.

name: Arlen the Untamed
rules: Allies you control have Assault 1 while you control a Form.

name: Armored Blue Wind Rider
rules: [Exhaust] -> Ready a location you control. When you place a resource face up, you may remove a counter from target location. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Armored Snowy Gryphon
rules: [Exhaust] -> Ready a location you control. When you play a resource face up, you may choose a counter on target location and add another of those counters to it. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Astani Dawngrace
rules: Protector, Assault 1, Mend 1

name: Aurius
rules: When a friendly Paladin is destroyed, it may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Ayluro Nightwind
rules: Mend 5;This ally can't heal heroes.

name: Azjol-anak Champion
rules: Nerubian Reputation This ally has +3 / +3 while an ability, ally, and equipment are in your graveyard.

name: Bantham, Jadefist Apprentice
rules: Protector This ally has -2/-2 while attacking.

name: Banzai
rules: This ally has +1 ATK for each card in opposing graveyards.

name: Blazemistress Lindsey
rules: [Exhaust], Discard an ability -> This ally deals 4 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Blazing Hippogryph
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;[Exhaust] -> Ready a location you control. When you play a resource face up, your hero may heal all damage from target Unique ally you control. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
flavour: How can the Scourge hope to escape while the Light now rides these golden wings? - Durizon, Champion of A'dal

name: Bluffstalker Honovi
rules: Assault 2 Allies have -2 ATK while defending against this ally.

name: Bolvar, Highlord of Fordragon Hold
rules: Untargetable;When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Fordragon Hold and put it into your resource row face up and exhausted.;Death Rattle: Put each location you control into it's owner's hand.

name: Bronthea the Resolute
rules: You can strike with [Paladin] weapons you control while this ally is in combat. [Paladin] armor you control can prevent damage that would be dealt to this ally.

name: Brother Keltan
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, it may deal 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.

name: Burly Berta
rules: Assault 2;When this ally deals damage to a hero, you may draw a card.;Death Rattle: Target ally you control has Assault 2 this turn.
flavour: Her actions speak lounder than her words ever could.

name: Cedric Darwin
rules: When this ally enters play, you may search target player's deck for a card and remove it from the game.

name: Charger
rules: You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to a second target hero or ally this turn. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked)

name: Commander Falstaav
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation Protector Once per turn: 2 -> Target Unique ally has +X ATK this turn, where X is its ATK.

name: Conqueror Hashkon
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target opposing Priests.

name: Conqueror Vun'jin
rules: When this ally enters play, target an opposing Paladin ally. You control it and it has Protector while this ally remains under your control.

name: Conqueror Zaala
rules: At the start of your turn, you may remove another ally you control from the game. If you do, remove target Druid all, [Druid] ability, or [Druid] equipment from the game.

name: Crusade Commander Entari
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;At the end of your turn, this ally deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally for each Unique ally you control.

name: Crusade Engineer Spitzpatrick
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation; Protector ;When this or another Unique ally enters play under your control, you may draw a card.

name: Crusader Lord Dalfors
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation If a Unique ally you control would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.

name: Daralis the Sanctifier
rules: When you play an Ongoing [Priest] ability, this ally may deal 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Devona Berkshire
rules: While you control a Death Knight or Warrior, this ally has Protector.;While you control a Hunter or Shaman, this ally has Assault 2.;While you control a Priest or Druid, this ally has Mend 2.

name: Dhoros Ravestrike
rules: 3 -> This ally has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Dorzok Shadowhand
rules: When this all deals combat damage, if you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

name: Dread Doomguard
rules: At the start of your turn, choose at random ability, equipment or resource. When this ally deals damage while attacking, you may destroy target card of that kind chosen this turn.

name: Eitrigg
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;Protector;Cards everywhere are Unique.

name: Eris Havenfire
rules: When this or another Priest ally enters play under your control, the next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Father Gustav
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation You pay 1 less to play Unique allies, to a minimum of 1.

name: Goru Thornmane
rules: Assault 2;When this ally deals damage while attacking, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Grumdur Bladebane
rules: Protector Each opposing ally has -1 ATK during its controller's turn.

name: Hanthal Lightward
rules: Protector Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to this ally by attackers with Assault.

name: High Commander Halford Wyrmbane
rules: Protector This ally has Assault 1 and Mend 1 for each other ally you control.
flavour: The first strike belongs to us, and the last strike is all that our enemies see.

name: Holy Guardian
rules: Protector Damage that this ally would deal is unpreventable. If shadow ([Shadow]) damage would be dealt, prevent all but 1 of it.

name: Hurdan the Everlasting
rules: When you play a non-Ongoing [Priest] ability, if this ally is in your graveyard, you my pay 2. If you do, put him into play.

name: Ixiya the Attuned
rules: Protector, Mend 1

name: Justicar Drathnea
rules: When this ally deals damage to a Paladin, that Paladin's controller discards a card.

name: Justicar Nimzi Banedrizzle
rules: When this ally leaves play, you may remove target Druid ally, [Druid] ability, or [Druid] equipment from the game.

name: Justicar Ularu
rules: When this ally enters combat for the first time on each of your turns, ready him if a Priest is defending.

name: Kaelyn Vineminder
rules: When this ally enters play, target opposing ally can't ready during its controller's ready step while this ally remains under your control.

name: Katoka Dreadblade
rules: When this ally enters play, you may exhaust target hero or ally. If it's not your turn, this ally deals 1 melee damage to that character. If it's your turn, draw a card.

name: Keeper Remulos
rules: When a Druid you control deals combat damage to a hero, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.

name: Lady Bancroft
rules: Prevent all damage that opposing heroes would deal to this ally.

name: Lynxia
rules: At the start of each turn, you may exhaust target ally.

name: Lyshala Ravenshot
rules: This ally has Long-Range while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or more.

name: Mithran the Sniper
rules: When an opposing ally, or equipment enters play, destroy this ally. If you do, destroy that opposing card.

name: Mothra
rules: Protector When this ally exhausts, ready up to three resources you control.

name: Murphy Watson
rules: This ally has Assault 3 while an ally is in your graveyard.

name: Muruna the Savage
rules: Protector Allies you control have +2 [Health] while you control a Form.

name: Nethermaven Donna Chastain
rules: Assault 3

name: Nurgle Tinkfrost
rules: Opposing heroes and allies can't attack unless their controller pays 1 for each character.

name: Roanauk Icemist
rules: At the end of your turn, put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Taunka ally token into play. Taunka you control have Assault 1.

name: Roshen the Oathsworn
rules: Protector You pay 1 less to play Auras, Blessings, and Seals.

name: Saurfang the Younger, Kor'kron Warlord
rules: Ferocity When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Kor'kron Vanguard, reveal it, and put it into your hand.;Death Rattle: Turn all locations you control face down.
flavour: Rise up, sons of the Horde! Blood and glory await us!

name: Sister Colleen Tulley
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;This ally has Mend 1 for each Unique ally you control.

name: Soram Wildbark
rules: Mend 1;When this ally heals damage from a hero or ally, that character as Assault 1 this turn.

name: Sullivan Holmes
rules: This ally has Mend 3 while an ally is in your graveyard.

name: Sunguard Cersie
rules: Protector Once per turn: 1 -> Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

name: Swift Hawkstrider
rules: Blood Elf Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to a second target hero or ally this turn. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Swift Mechanostrider
rules: Gnome Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, you may ready an equipment you control. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Swift Timber Wolf
rules: Orc Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you play a resource face up, your hero has Assault 2 this turn. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Tubs Klankbopple
rules: When this ally enters play, he may deal 4 melee damage to target ally with a cost or 4 less.

name: Tuskmender Jan'zu
rules: This ally has Mend 2 while she's damaged.

name: Uruka the Cutthroat
rules: When this ally is dealt damage, target opponent reveals his hand.;Death Rattle: You may choose ability, ally, or equipment. If you do, target opponent reveals his hand, and this ally deals 1 melee damage to his hero for each revealed card of that kind.

name: Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation Protector This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Unique ally you control

name: Vuz'din
rules: Opposing Ongoing abilities lose and can't have powers.

name: Wyndarr Shadefist
rules: This ally has Stealth while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or less.

name: Zugna, Windseer Apprentice
rules: Assault 1 When this ally exhausts for the first time ach turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready her.

name: Angry Dread
rules: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.

name: Boots of the Renewed Flight
rules: When this armor prevents damage, you may pay 4. If you do, draw a card.

name: Cloak of the Shadowed Sun
rules: Your hero has Protector.;[Druid] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.;[Warrior] Hero: Opposing allies have -1 [Health].

name: Colossal Skull-Clad Cleaver
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a skull counter. This weapon has Assault 1 for each skull counter.

name: Fading Glow
rules: When combat damage is dealt with this weapon, your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Final Voyage
rules: When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. This weapon has Assault 1 for each card in opposing hands.

name: Fist of the Deity
rules: Your hero has Dual Wield. When this weapon enters play, it has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Gigantique Bag
rules: You have no maximum hand size. [Exhaust], Pay 1 for each card in your hand -> Draw a card.

name: Gloves of Token Respect
rules: On your turn: 2 -> Put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Spider ally token into play. [Exhaust], Destroy this armor -> Put a copy of target ally token into play.

name: Haunting Call
rules: 2, Exhaust your hero -> Remove three target cards in one opposing graveyard from the game. Add a spirit counter for each ally removed this way. At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero for each spirit counter.

name: Helm of Vital Protection
rules: Weapons you control have +1 ATK. Other armor you control have +1 [DEF].

name: Hood of the Exodus
rules: When an ally you control with Assault deals combat damage to an opponent's hero, he discards a card.

name: Idol of the Shooting Star
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -->Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally. When you play an ally, ready this item.

name: Leggings of the Honored
rules: This armor has +4 [DEF] if an ally entered a graveyard this turn.

name: Libram of Radiance
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. When you play a [Paladin] armor, ready this item.

name: Life and Death
rules: When you play an ally, your may draw a card. When al ally you control leaves play, discard a card.

name: Life-Binder's Locket
rules: [Paladin] Hero: [Exhaust], Discard a card -> If a friendly hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent 1 of it. [Priest] Hero: [Exhaust], Discard a card -> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Lifeblade of Belgaristrasz
rules: Finishing Move: Rogue (To play, remove X Rogues in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.);When this weapon enters play, your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally and heals X damage from itself.;(received errata)

name: Nerubian Conqueror
rules: When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. If a card would enter an opposing graveyard, remove it from the game instead.

name: Platinum Disks of Swiftness
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next ally that shares a class with your hero this turn.
flavour: Created by the Makers, the technology has yet to be reproduced successfully.

name: Protective Barricade of the Light
rules: [Paladin] Hero: This armor has +2 [DEF];[Shaman] Hero: You pay 2 less to play this armor.

name: Silent Crusader
rules: When an opponent's hero is dealt combat damage with this weapon, exhaust all cards he controls.

name: Spire of Sunset
rules: On your turn: 2, Exhaust your hero -> Your hero deals fire damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of different classes among heroes and allies you control.

name: Staff of Trickery
rules: Exhaust your hero, discard a card -> Ready or exhaust target card if it shares a card type with the card you discarded.;(received errata)

name: Statue Generator
rules: When this item enters play, remove target ally from the game. If you do, add three marble counters, and that ally's owner puts it into play under his control when this item leaves play. At the start of your turn, remove a marble counter. If none remain, destroy this item.

name: Sun-Emblazoned Chestplate
rules: When this armor prevents damage that would be dealt by an attacker, your hero deals that much unpreventable holy damage to that attacker.

name: Sword of Justice
rules: This weapon enters play with a +1 ATK counter for each card in your hand. Remove a +1 ATK counter -> Exhaust target ally.

name: Sympathy
rules: If an ally you control would be dealt damage, 1 of it is dealt to your hero instead.

name: Torch of Holy Fire
rules: 1, Exhaust your hero -> Reveal a random card from your hand. If it's a [Holy] card, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Upstanding Spaulders
rules: Each player can't ready more than three resources during his ready step.

name: Wraith Spear
rules: When you strike with this weapon while your hero is defending, it hels 4 damage from itself.

name: Archmage Barstow
rules: Flip Barstow, discard a Mage -> Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have powers this turn.

name: Crusader Farisa
rules: On your turn: Flip Farisa, discard a Paladin -> Farisa heals 3 damage from target ally. Draw a card.

name: Durzion, Champion of A'dal
rules: Flip Durzion, discard a Priest -> Durzion heals 2 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Earthmender Vaaki
rules: Flip Vaaki, discard a Shaman -> Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Vaaki heals 3, 2, 1 damage from them respectively.

name: Esonea
rules: Flip Esonea, discard a Warrior -> Weapons you control have +3 ATK this turn.

name: Gramm Thunderjaw
rules: Flip Gramm, discard a Hunter -> This turn, taget ally has +2 ATK, and a second target ally has -2 ATK.

name: Harona Proudmane
rules: Flip Harona, discard a Druid -> Harona heals 6 damage from target hero.

name: Jeremiah Karvok
rules: Flip Jeremiah, discard a Warlock -> When you next play an ability this turn, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.

name: Krog the Deathfist
rules: On your turn: Flip Krog, discard a Death Knight -> Put target equipment on the bottom of owner's deck.

name: Krunkle Deadspark
rules: On your turn: Flip Krunkle, discard a Death Knight -> Krunkle heals 2 damage from himself and has Assault 2 this turn.

name: Kungen the Thunderer
rules: On your turn: Flip Kungen, discard a Warrior -> Opposing cards can't exhaust this turn.

name: Lunira Swiftbreath
rules: Flip Lunira, discard a Druid -> You pay 1 less to play your next ally this turn.

name: Mojo Master Zandum
rules: Flip Zandum, discard a Priest -> Zandum heals 4 damage divided as you choose from any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Nuvon Dawnfury
rules: On your turn: Flip Nuvon, discard a Mage -> When you draw a card this turn, Nuvon may deal 1 arcane damage to target ally.

name: Rinni Gloomtrik
rules: On your turn: Flip Rinni Gloomtrik, discard a Warlock -> Rinni deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, it's controller discards a card.

name: Sarina the Immaculate
rules: On your turn: Flip Sarina, discard a Paladin -> Sarina heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Spiritwalker Kavi'je
rules: Flip Kavi'je, discard a Shaman -> You pay 2 less to play your next totem this turn.

name: Sunstalker Andora
rules: On your turn: Flip Andora, discard a Rogue -> When target ally is dealt damage this turn, destroy it.

name: Thaka Deadeye
rules: Flip Thaka, discard a Hunter -> Ready up to two resources you control.

name: Tysandri Duskstrike
rules: On your turn: Flip Tysandri, discard a Rogue -> Tysandri deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.

name: Angrathar the Wrathgate
rules: When a card enters an opposing graveyard from anywhere, add a rattle counter.;On your turn: 2, [Exhaust], Remove three rattle counters -> Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Scourge ally token into play.

name: Fordragon Hold
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target [Alliance] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.;If you control an ally with Bolvar in its name: [Exhaust] -> [Alliance] heroes and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.

name: Kor'kron Vanguard
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 1 this turn.;If you control an ally with Saurfang in its name: [Exhaust] -> Target [Horde] hero or ally you control has Assault 3 this turn.

name: Highlord Tirion Fordring
rules: [Druid], [Paladin], [Priest], or [Shaman] Hero Required ; Argent Crusade Reputation;Unique allies you control can't be targeted by opponents. On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Put target Unique ally from your graveyard into play.

name: Spirit of Redemption
rules: Holy Hero Required; You pay 1 less to play Spirit of Redemption for each damage on your hero. Spirit of Redemption can't be destroyed while you control an ally.

name: A Tale of Valor
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to that card's cost.

name: Apply This Twice a Day
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. If a hero or ally you controlled healed damage this turn, draw another card.
flavour: This elixir should protect against their spit. Offer it to Ko'char for me, will you? - Zort

name: Conversing With the Depths
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each five cards in your graveyard.

name: Cycle of Life
rules: If an ally entered play and an ally left play this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: I'm Not Dead Yet!
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 1 [Holy] / 1 [Health] Unique Priest ally token named Father Kamaros into play with Mend 4.

name: Light Within the Darkness
rules: If a hero or ally you controlled dealt holy ([Holy]) damage this turn: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: No Mere Dream
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal a top card of your deck and put it into your resource row face down and exhausted. If it was a location or quest, you may turn it face up.

name: No One to Save You
rules: If you hero was dealt 5 or more damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: On Ruby Wings
rules: On your turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 0 [Fire] / 3 [Health] Wyrmrest Vanquisher ally token into play with Mount (1) and When you place a resource face up, you may draw a card.

name: Paladin Training
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target hero or ally you control has Protector this turn. Prevent all damage that it would be dealt while protecting this turn.

name: Planning for the Future
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target opponent chooses one: Put that card into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Really Big Worm
rules: Exhaust ten cards you control to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: Return to Angrathar
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each Scourge ally you control. Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Seeds of the Lashers
rules: Exhaust seven cards you control to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: The Call of the Crusade
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation For each Unique ally you control, you may pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.

name: The Ichor of Undeath
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Wanton Warlord
rules: Exhaust four cards you control to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Landro's Gift
rules: Search your deck for a Loot card, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck. Then, if an opponent controls more resources than you, draw a card.
flavour: Roll the dice and see if you get lucky! - Landro Longshot

name: Blazing Hippogryph
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;[Exhaust] -> Ready a location you control. When you play a resource face up, your hero may heal all damage from target Unique ally you control. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
flavour: How can the Scourge hope to escape while the Light now rides these golden wings? - Durizon, Champion of A'dal

name: Statue Generator
rules: When this item enters play, remove target ally from the game. If you do, add three marble counters, and that ally's owner puts it into play under his control when this item leaves play. At the start of your turn, remove a marble counter. If none remain, destroy this item.

name: Torch of Holy Fire
rules: 1, Exhaust your hero -> Reveal a random card from your hand. If it's a [Holy] card, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Father Gustav
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation You pay 1 less to play Unique allies, to a minimum of 1.

name: Wanton Warlord
rules: Exhaust four cards you control to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
